org.svvrl.goal.core.io
Class ACTLCodec

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      org.svvrl.goal.core.io.LogicCodec<ACTL,ACTLFormula>
          org.svvrl.goal.core.io.ACTLCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class ACTLCodec
extends LogicCodec<ACTL,ACTLFormula>

An ACTLCodec is a codec that can encode/decode ACTL holders. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
